highlights: Designed and developed features for a credit risk platform with optimized risk rating models to enhance decision-making accuracy for commercial loan applications.
Led the design of a full-stack REST API generation tool using Python, defining backend architecture and data models to accelerate model deployment from 6 months to 1 month.

Engineered an interactive sandbox platform in Angular and TypeScript that enabled underwriters to simulate credit risk rating models, significantly reducing the risk of errors in live lending decision.
Designed a flexible ETL solution in Java, enabling seamless integration of model- generated data with legacy systems and facilitating the data pipelines and data- driven analytics.
Managed deployment of various services on CI/CD pipelines (Jenkins, Kubernetes,AWS), ensuring continuous delivery by automating the process and reducing production release time to one week.
Designed and implemented scalable RESTful APIs using Spring Boot, leveraging ORM principles with Spring Data JPA to structure relational data access and ensure API consistency.
Designed responsive user interfaces in Angular and Bootstrap, implementing client- side data caching and lazy loading to significantly optimize page load times and enhance user experience.
Developed and tested REST API endpoints using the Spring framework and built a unit testing infrastructure with Selenium, which reduced defects found during development.

skills.name: Frameworks
keywords: Flask, Angular, Spring Boot, Spring Data JPA

skills.name: Tools & Platforms
keywords: Git, Jenkins, Docker, Kubernetes, AWS(EC2, S3, Lambda), Copilot

skills.name: AI
keywords: AI Assisted Development, Model Context Protocol, Retrieval-Augmented Generation

professional_summary: Senior Full Stack Developer with 6 years of experience building and scaling high-performance financial applications. Expert in Python (Flask), Java (Spring Boot), and Angular, with a proven track record of engineering robust REST APIs and scalable ETL solutions. Adept at leveraging AI-assisted development tools to accelerate testing cycles and streamline code generation, deploying solutions in cloud-native (AWS, Kubernetes) environments.
